segment.source: Change history for Manage and update Windows 10
segment.target: Change history for Manage and update Windows 10

segment.source: This topic lists new and updated topics in the Manage and update Windows 10 documentation for Windows 10 and Windows 10 Mobile.
segment.target: This topic lists new and updated topics in the Manage and update Windows 10 documentation for Windows 10 and Windows 10 Mobile.

segment.source: Administrative Tools in Windows 10
segment.target: Administrative Tools in Windows 10

segment.source: Administrative Tools is a folder in Control Panel that contains tools for system administrators and advanced users.
segment.target: Administrative Tools is a folder in Control Panel that contains tools for system administrators and advanced users.

segment.source: Cortana integration in your business or enterprise
segment.target: Cortana integration in your business or enterprise

segment.source: The world’s first personal digital assistant helps users get things done, even at work.
segment.target: The world’s first personal digital assistant helps users get things done, even at work.

segment.source: Cortana includes powerful configuration options specifically to optimize for unique small to medium-sized business and enterprise environments.
segment.target: Cortana includes powerful configuration options specifically to optimize for unique small to medium-sized business and enterprise environments.

segment.source: Manage corporate devices
segment.target: Manage corporate devices

segment.source: You can use the same management tools to manage all device types running Windows 10 : desktops, laptops, tablets, and phones.
segment.target: You can use the same management tools to manage all device types running Windows 10 : desktops, laptops, tablets, and phones.

segment.source: And your current management tools, such as Group Policy, Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI), PowerShell scripts, Orchestrator runbooks, System Center tools, and so on, will continue to work for Windows 10 on desktop editions.
segment.target: And your current management tools, such as Group Policy, Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI), PowerShell scripts, Orchestrator runbooks, System Center tools, and so on, will continue to work for Windows 10 on desktop editions.

segment.source: Manage Windows 10 Start layout options
segment.target: Manage Windows 10 Start layout options

segment.source: Organizations might want to deploy a customized Start screen and menu to devices running Windows 10 Enterprise or Windows 10 Education.
segment.target: Organizations might want to deploy a customized Start screen and menu to devices running Windows 10 Enterprise or Windows 10 Education.

segment.source: A standard Start layout can be useful on devices that are common to multiple users and devices that are locked down for specialized purposes.
segment.target: A standard Start layout can be useful on devices that are common to multiple users and devices that are locked down for specialized purposes.

segment.source: Lock down Windows 10
segment.target: Lock down Windows 10

segment.source: Enterprises often need to manage how people use corporate devices.
segment.target: Enterprises often need to manage how people use corporate devices.

segment.source: Windows 10 provides a number of features and methods to help you lock down specific parts of a Windows 10 device.
segment.target: Windows 10 provides a number of features and methods to help you lock down specific parts of a Windows 10 device.

segment.source: Join Windows 10 Mobile to Azure Active Directory
segment.target: Join Windows 10 Mobile to Azure Active Directory

segment.source: Devices running Windows 10 Mobile can join Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) when the device is configured during the out-of-box experience (OOBE).
segment.target: Devices running Windows 10 Mobile can join Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) when the device is configured during the out-of-box experience (OOBE).

segment.source: Configure devices without MDM
segment.target: Configure devices without MDM

segment.source: Create a runtime provisioning package to apply settings, profiles, and file assets to a device running Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Enterprise, Windows 10 Education, Windows 10 Mobile, or Windows 10 Mobile Enterprise.
segment.target: Create a runtime provisioning package to apply settings, profiles, and file assets to a device running Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Enterprise, Windows 10 Education, Windows 10 Mobile, or Windows 10 Mobile Enterprise.

segment.source: Windows 10 servicing options for updates and upgrades
segment.target: Windows 10 servicing options for updates and upgrades

segment.source: This article describes the new servicing options available in Windows 10, Windows 10 Mobile, and Windows 10 IoT Core (IoT Core) and how they enable enterprises to keep their devices current with the latest feature upgrades.
segment.target: This article describes the new servicing options available in Windows 10, Windows 10 Mobile, and Windows 10 IoT Core (IoT Core) and how they enable enterprises to keep their devices current with the latest feature upgrades.

segment.source: It also covers related topics, such as how enterprises can make better use of Windows Update, and what the new servicing options mean for support lifecycles.
segment.target: It also covers related topics, such as how enterprises can make better use of Windows Update, and what the new servicing options mean for support lifecycles.

segment.source: Application development for Windows as a service
segment.target: Application development for Windows as a service

segment.source: In today’s environment, where user expectations frequently are set by device-centric experiences, complete product cycles need to be measured in months, not years.
segment.target: In today’s environment, where user expectations frequently are set by device-centric experiences, complete product cycles need to be measured in months, not years.

segment.source: Additionally, new releases must be made available on a continual basis, and must be deployable with minimal impact on users.
segment.target: Additionally, new releases must be made available on a continual basis, and must be deployable with minimal impact on users.

segment.source: Microsoft designed Windows 10 to meet these requirements by implementing a new approach to innovation, development, and delivery called Windows as a service (WaaS).
segment.target: Microsoft designed Windows 10 to meet these requirements by implementing a new approach to innovation, development, and delivery called Windows as a service (WaaS).

segment.source: The key to enabling significantly shorter product cycles while maintaining high quality levels is an innovative community-centric approach to testing that Microsoft has implemented for Windows 10.
segment.target: The key to enabling significantly shorter product cycles while maintaining high quality levels is an innovative community-centric approach to testing that Microsoft has implemented for Windows 10.

segment.source: The community, known as Windows Insiders, is comprised of millions of users around the world.
segment.target: The community, known as Windows Insiders, is comprised of millions of users around the world.

segment.source: When Windows Insiders opt in to the community, they test many builds over the course of a product cycle and provide feedback to Microsoft through an iterative methodology called flighting.
segment.target: When Windows Insiders opt in to the community, they test many builds over the course of a product cycle and provide feedback to Microsoft through an iterative methodology called flighting.

segment.source: Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Welcome to the Windows Store for Business!
segment.target: Welcome to the Windows Store for Business!

segment.source: You can use the Store for Business, to find, acquire, distribute, and manage apps for your organization.
segment.target: You can use the Store for Business, to find, acquire, distribute, and manage apps for your organization.
